Title: Bird Hunt
Description: This project is intended as a companion to Jeff Paries and Jesse Liberty's Silverlight Windows Phone 7 "Bird Hunt" game tutorial. The project contains two downloads - one is a "code-along" solution, and the other is the completed application in full.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is intended as a companion to Jeff Paries and Jesse Liberty's Silverlight Windows Phone 7 "Bird Hunt" game tutorial. The project contains two downloads - one is a "code-along" solution, and the other is the completed application in full.
